name: Poly
description:
Blast your way through countless enemies gaining powerful upgrades which turn you into a shape obliterating machine!

Gather items after each wave and build synergies with your character and build to survive countless waves of enemies

| Features |
- 50+ upgrades with countless synergies and stacking effects!
- Unique enemies which have unique abilities
- A variety of difficulties to play at your level and pace
- Unlockable challenges and items
